references.paper_title: Mobile app tasks with iterative feedback (MOTIF): Addressing task feasibility in interactive visual environments.
references.reason: This paper introduced a dataset and methodology for evaluating mobile GUI agents, which is foundational to the current work.

references.paper_title: AMEX: Android multi-annotation expo dataset for mobile GUI agents.
references.reason: This paper introduced AMEX dataset, which is used for training in this work.

references.paper_title: InternVL: Scaling up vision foundation models and aligning for generic visual-linguistic tasks.
references.reason: This paper introduced InternVL model, which is used for training in this work.

references.paper_title: AndroidWorld: A dynamic benchmarking environment for autonomous agents.
references.reason: This paper introduced AndroidWorld, a dynamic evaluation platform for mobile GUI agents, which is compared to in this work.

references.paper_title: UGIF-DataSet: A new dataset for cross-lingual, cross-modal sequential actions on the UI.
references.reason: This paper introduced UGIF dataset, which is compared to in this work.
